name: Birthday Cupcake
description: Birthday Cupcakes are the perfect dessert for your special celebration!

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie
description: Crispy edges, a buttery chew, and plenty of chocolate chunks in every bite.

name: Truffle Pralines
description: Rich praline chocolate truffles made with homemade maple praline butter, chocolate, and raw cacao butter, coated in a dark chocolate shell.

name: Donuts
description: Our delicious donut flavors rotate, with 16 options available to choose from daily.

name: Raspberry Cream Cupcake
description: Vanilla cupcakes with raspberry cream frosting.

name: Marmalade Biscuits
description: These marmalade biscuits use sweet and tangy marmalade to create the ultimate accompaniment for any tea break.

name: Marble Cake
description: With swirls of tender vanilla and fudgy chocolate cake, this marble cake looks fancy but tastes like pure old-fashioned goodness.
